entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening. Snow level near valley bottom. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain mixed with snow. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning near noon. Rain mixed with snow early in the afternoon. Snow level rising to 1200 metres in the afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain. Snow level 1200 metres lowering to 800 metres before morning. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 19 February 2023
